column5: What if Gene Cranick, of South Fulton, Tennessee, ignored a fire ban in the bush of Northern Ontario and walked away from a blazing trash fire that resulted in a few thousand acre burn?  He was not a victim of the fire in Obion County, TN.  He was a volunteer.

He'd get the total fire supression bill Connie, that's for sure. Kinda an inverse of paying in advance before lighting your burn barrel behind the house.  That whole situation sucked down there for sure.  Hope all is well with you and yours, and that you've paid your $75 !  Wayne
